warning: SURGEON GENERAL'S WARNING: Smoking Causes Lung Cancer, Heart Disease, Emphysema, And May Complicate Pregnancy.

letter.body: Thank you for your interest in the Winston Winners Club 40th Anniversary Celebration Offer. We regret to inform you that we will not be able to fill your order. According to the date of birth provided on your order form, you are under 21 years of age. R. J. Reynolds Tobacco Co. takes prudent steps to ensure that all participants in our promotional offers are 21 years of age or older. Included in all promotional offers is our restriction of the offer to smokers 21 years of age or older.
letter.closing: Sincerely, Jill Scott, Consumer Service, Gage Marketing Group, A Service Organization for R. J. Reynolds Tobacco Co.

additional_info.message: THANK YOU FOR FINDING THE FOUNTAIN OF YOUTH
additional_info.note: PS. FOR INFO ONLY. FORGET YOUR OFFER.
